Subjects: Alexis, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Alexis — in 6-line stanzas (earlier version)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Sitteþ stille with outen strifand i wol tellen of a
                    lyf…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Graunt vs alle god endyngand in heuene a wonyng. AMEN Par
                    Charite.

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Sitteþ stille wiþouten strif And I schal telle ȝoure
                    lif…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Graunte vs alle gode endyngeAnd in heuene a wonyngeAmen
                    par charite

DULCosVii14.First Lines:
Litteth (sic) stille withouten stryfAnd I wille tellen yow
                    of the lyf…
DULCosVii14.Last Lines:
…And in heuen to haue a wonnyngAmen amen for
                    charite
DULCosVii14.Attributed Title:
Uita sancti Alexi confessoris (f. 92); Explicit vita sancti
                        allexi confessoris (f. 97v)

NapXIIIB29.First Lines:
[s]ittith stille with outen trife [sic]ycche wolle yow telle
                    the life…
NapXIIIB29.Last Lines: …and in heuyn wonnyngAmen amen pur cherite
NapXIIIB29.Note:
On p. 86, following the explicit, is ‘hic pennam fixi penitet
                        me si male Scripci.’
NapXIIIB29.Attributed Title:
Explicit vita sancti Alex (p. 86); Explicit vita sancti allexi
                        confessoris (f. 97v)
